response.original_title: Spent: Fighting Economic Abuse in India
response.overview: This documentary is part of the 'Womenâ€™s employment, economic abuse and food insecurity'  project in Bihar, India funded by the Global Challenges Research Fund (GCRF). As part of the project, 50 Hindu and Muslim women across a range of occupations, class and caste categories were interviewed (21 video and 29 audio). This film is based on stories of five  women  who took part in this project. The film hopes to bring out these women's resilience and spirit in the face of economic abuse.
response.title: Spent: Fighting Economic Abuse in India
